full_summary:
### Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) Solution Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Project Overview

The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is seeking a cloud-based Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) management. The successful proponent will provide software, licenses, ongoing support, training, documentation, maintenance, and implementation services.

#### Proposal Objective

The objective of this RFP is to enter into a non-exclusive agreement with a qualified vendor to provide a GRC SaaS solution. The agreement will be for an initial term of three years, with the option to extend for up to two additional one-year terms, bringing the total contract to five years.

#### Key Requirements

* Cloud-based GRC software and licenses
* On-going support, including training and maintenance
* Documentation and implementation services
* Non-exclusive agreement with CMHC

#### Critical Dates

* Tender closing date: 2024-03-21 (14:00:00)
* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: None

#### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation number: 002376
* Amendment number: 11
* Publication date: 2024-02-07
* Tender status: Expired
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Supplier Eligibility

* Suppliers must be able to demonstrate experience in providing GRC SaaS solutions
* Suppliers must be able to provide proof of certification from a recognized industry body (if applicable)

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

* Ability to meet the requirements of this RFP
* Experience and qualifications of the vendor
* Plan for implementation and training
* Pricing arrangement
